Michael - March 16, 2012 - Motorola XOOM with version 5.1
Extensive, diverse, & customization without equal.
I can, with due diligence, offer my recommendation of 5 stars to any individuals seeking the interface-customization with seemingly infinite variation. This icon pack can be altered to thousands of unique apps, in dozens of colors with frequent updates keeping things current. 4.99 is relatively pricey for an app; in perspective, though, it's less than a Taco Bell combo & may well be a major portion of your Android ecosystem forever. Whereas that Big Beef Supreme will be long evacuated within hours of the meal. Great work, developer.
